info.author: Sebastien Pierre
info.description:
Tahchee is a tool for developers and Web designers that makes it possible to
easily build a static Web site using the Cheetah template system. It is used to
fill in the gap between bare template and macro processing system and dynamic
template-based Web sites. It acts both as a build system (a la "make") as well
as an extension to the Cheetah template that makes it really easy to build small
to medium-sized sites. It is ideal for writing open source project or small
company Web sites.
info.name: Tahchee
info.summary: Automated static and dynamic web site creation tool
info.html_description: Tahchee is a tool for developers and Web designers that makes it possible to easily build a static Web site using the Cheetah template system. It is used to fill in the gap between bare template and macro processing system and dynamic template-based Web sites. It acts both as a build system (a la “make”) as well as an extension to the Cheetah template that makes it really easy to build small to medium-sized sites. It is ideal for writing open source project or small company Web sites.
